strategy_1_selective_inclusion.name: Selective Inclusion Based on Data Quality
strategy_1_selective_inclusion.description: Include only products with drive links and detailed specifications

strategy_2_tiered_inclusion.name: Tiered Inclusion with Quality Flags
strategy_2_tiered_inclusion.description: Include all products but mark data quality levels

criteria.tier_1: Products with drive links and detailed specs

cons: May confuse users with incomplete data

strategy_3_placeholder_approach.name: Placeholder with Enhancement Pipeline
strategy_3_placeholder_approach.description: Create placeholders for all missing products with enhancement workflow

criteria.enhancement_queue: Products marked for future data collection

strategy_4_hybrid_approach.name: Hybrid Quality-Based Inclusion
strategy_4_hybrid_approach.description: Combine selective inclusion with targeted enhancement
pros: Balanced approach to quality and completeness

implementation_phases.name: High-Quality Product Integration
implementation_phases.description: Include products with drive links and detailed specifications

implementation_phases.name: Specification Enhancement
implementation_phases.description: Enhance specifications for products with basic data

immediate_actions: Analyze drive link accessibility and validity
Categorize missing products by business priority
Implement data quality flags in JSON structure
Create enhancement workflow for low-quality products
long_term_goals: Standardize specification formats across all products
Establish continuous product data enhancement pipeline
recommendations.rationale: With 231 products having detailed specifications, a hybrid approach allows selective quality inclusion.
